description: After Etta is unable to lead her local girl's league, Diana takes over and teaches the girls that hard work and setting goals is the key to success.  The backup story is a reprinting of the space odyssey which was written by Messner Loebs
name: Wonder Girls; A Sudden Deadly Leap

description: Threats to the Savage Land come from outside and from within as Ka-Zar struggles to make sense of growing conflicts among his people. With a terrible famine raging across Pangea, Outsiders are making plans to return. The forests burn as Pangeans strike deals with terrestrial corporations. And complicating this, the reemergence of an ancient threat: the mysterious Ether Tribe have returned to punish anyone who dares deal with the outside world. Standing at the center of these myriad conflicts: one man and his tiger.
name: Attack from Within!

description: Ka-Zar’s hand is forced in his battle against an enemy he cannot see, tipping the scales of a clandestine war in favor of those whom the Pangeans can never understand. The Outsiders are coming back – they have always been preparing for this moment – and there is nothing the Tribes of the Savage Land can do to stop them. Ka-Zar will have to think of an unconventional response, and soon...or the battle for Pangean freedom will be lost before it even begins.
name: The Threat of Flame!

description:
The Scarlett's Curse Trade Paperback will be available in April 2008! It will contain the entire 7-part intro series, including brand new pin-ups and art by renowned artists and the team that worked on Scarlett's Curse.

Collects issues #0-2 of Scarlett's Curse, with bonus material from the artists.

The Ice Vikings of Valhalla (10 pages)

Whispering Wires of Death (8 pages)

Ape Women of Antilla (6 pages)
name: The Ice Vikings of Valhalla
1861-1865 Naval Actions of the Civil War

description: Collects volumes 1-7 of Johnny the Homicidal Maniac, as well as some from Carpe Noctum magazine.
name: JTHM The Director's Cut

person_credits.name: Jhonen Vasquez
person_credits.role: writer, artist, penciler, letterer, inker, colorist, cover

description: Collects SQUEE! issues 1-4 as well as material from Johnny The Homicidal Maniac
name: SQUEE'S Wonderful Big Giant Book of Unspeakable Horrors
